document.full_text: mike sorrentino, the "jersey shore" star known as the situation, has become the latest cast member from mtv's hit reality show to sign a spinoff deal with the cable channel.
document.title: "jersey shore" star sorrentino eyes own series
lines_and_colors: mike sorrentino, the "jersey shore" star known as the situation, has become the latest cast member from mtv's hit reality show to sign a spinoff deal with the cable channel.
